resources.string: This app is not responsible if any data is lost, kindly take a backup before proceeding.

For security reasons only ONE app can read & write SMS for mobile running on Android-KitKat and above.\nAfter deleting the duplicates revert back to default/previous SMS app. Find more at https://android-developers.blogspot.com/2013/10/getting-your-sms-apps-ready-for-kitkat.html
%s requires access to \"READ_SMS & WRITE_SMS\" to delete duplicate messages.
Default SMS app not changed. Cannot read/write SMS
App uses read/write sms permission to find & delete duplicates. No personal data is read.
Without READ_SMS permission, app cannot run.\n
" App will exit on press of "
This will delete similar messages from the SAME sender irrespective of any date.
Delete X SMS in batch, max 99
